ability.name: Shell On
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Shelmet from your hand. If you do, search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Absorb

text: You can play this card only if you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent. Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

text: If the Pokémon this card is attached to discards Energy for its Retreat Cost, put that Energy into your hand instead of the discard pile.

text: The attacks of Darkness Pokémon and Dragon Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) do 10 more damage to the opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Fighting Memory
text: The Silvally-GX this card is attached to is a Fighting Pokémon.

cards.name: Gladion
text: Look at your face-down Prize cards and put 1 of them into your hand. Then, shuffle this Gladion into your remaining Prize cards and put them back face down. If you didn’t play this Gladion from your hand, it does nothing.

cards.name: Lusamine
text: Put 2 in any combination of Supporter and Stadium cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Peeking Red Card
text: Your opponent reveals their hand. You may have your opponent count the cards in their hand, shuffle those cards into their deck, then draw that many cards.

cards.name: Psychic Memory
text: The Silvally-GX this card is attached to is a Psychic Pokémon.

cards.name: Sea of Nothingness
text: Special Conditions are not removed when Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s) evolve or devolve.

cards.name: Counter Energy
text: This card provides Colorless Energy. If you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent, and if this card is attached to a Pokémon that isn't a Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 2 Energy at a time.
